Title: Relates to creating a tax credit for energy efficiency home improvements
Summary: Creates a tax credit for energy efficiency home improvements and products affixed to homes; directs NYSERDA to develop a list of qualified products and improvements and provides that such improvements shall not affect the assessed valuation of real property for tax purposes.
LawCode: Amd ยง606, Tax L; add ยง582-b, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the real property tax law, in relation to providing a tax credit for the purchase of energy efficient home improvements
